How do I place an order?: Browse the products, add items to your cart, then proceed to checkout to complete your order.
Can I order without creating an account?: No, creating an account helps us process orders and provide updates efficiently.
Can I modify my order after placing it?: Orders can only be modified within 30 minutes of placement if not yet shipped.
How long does delivery take?: Standard shipping usually takes 2–5 business days depending on your location.
How can I track my order?: After shipping, you’ll receive a tracking number via email and in your account dashboard.
Do you offer international shipping?: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries. International shipping fees and customs apply.
What should I do if my package hasn’t ar: Please check your tracking number and contact support if the delay exceeds 7 days.
What is your return policy?: We accept returns within 14 days of delivery if items are unused and in original packaging.
How do I request a return?: Log in to your account, go to order history, and click on 'Request Return' next to the item.
Do I have to pay for return shipping?: Return shipping is free for defective or incorrect items. Otherwise, you cover the cost.
Can I exchange an item?: We do not offer direct exchanges. Please return the item and place a new order.
When will I receive my refund?: Refunds are processed within 5–7 business days after receiving your return.
What payment methods do you accept?: We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.
Is my payment information secure?: Yes, all transactions are encrypted and processed through secure payment gateways.
Can I use more than one promo code?: Only one promo code can be applied per order unless stated otherwise.
Do you offer student discounts?: Yes, students can get 10% off after verifying their student status through our partner portal.
Can I cancel my order?: You can cancel an order within 1 hour of placing it unless it has already been shipped.
Why was my order canceled?: Orders may be canceled due to payment issues or item unavailability. You’ll be notified by email.
Do you have a mobile app?: Yes, our app is available on both iOS and Android for a better shopping experience.
How can I contact customer support?: You can contact us via the Help Center, email, or live chat between 9 AM – 6 PM weekdays.
What if I received the wrong item?: We’re sorry! Contact customer service and we’ll send the correct item at no extra charge.
Can I change my shipping address?: Yes, but only if the order has not yet been shipped. Contact support as soon as possible.
Do you sell gift cards?: Yes, we offer digital gift cards in various denominations, delivered instantly by email.
Can I use a gift card and a credit card: Yes, you can use a gift card and pay the remaining balance with a credit card.
Are there any subscription plans?: Yes, we offer a monthly membership for discounts, early access, and free returns.
How do I unsubscribe from emails?: Click the unsubscribe link at the bottom of any email or adjust your preferences in your account.
Can I reorder a previous purchase?: Yes, log in and view your order history to reorder with a single click.
Do you have physical stores?: Currently, we are online-only but occasionally host pop-up shops in select cities.
How do I apply for a job?: Visit our careers page to view current openings and submit your application.
How do I leave a review?: After your purchase, you’ll receive a review link by email or you can review via your account.
